  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    AbstractDecaLexer.SkipANTLRPostAction
    Exception used to skip ANTLR code from doInclude to nextToken().
    CircularInclude
    Exception raised when a chain of #include is circular, i.e.
    DecaRecognitionException
    Base class for exception to be thrown manually within parser actions.
    IncludeFileNotFound
    Exception raised when a #include is found for a file that cannot be found or opened.
    InvalidLValue
    Syntax error for an expression that should be an lvalue (ie that can be assigned), but is not.

Package fr.ensimag.deca.syntax Description

Lexical and syntaxctic analysis for the Deca language.
